resources.string: SELECT students.ROLLNO, students.NAME FROM students INNER JOIN ( SELECT course.BRANCH, course.sem, assignments.section FROM assignments INNER JOIN course ON assignments.course_id = course.courseid WHERE assignments.assignment_id = ? ) assignedClass ON students.BRANCH = assignedClass.BRANCH WHERE students.sem = assignedClass.sem AND students.SEC = assignedClass.section

select assignments.assignment_id, course.scode, left(course.branch, 1) as branch, course.sem, assignments.section from assignments inner join course on assignments.course_id = course.courseid where assignments.faculty_id = ?

select convert(varchar, session.[timestamp], 0) as timestamp, [session].num_present, session.num_absent from [session] inner join assignments on assignments.assignment_id = [session].assignment_id and date = cast(getdate() as date) where assignments.assignment_id = ?
